DOC.brief_summary: Introduction : The exercise perform elastic tool appear current scenario clinical tool present advantage easy handle , low cost safety . However , use assessment tool , specifically localize muscular resistance , reduce standardize . In addition , record physiological / neurofunctional effect test use tool , since allows differentiate degree prescription . Objective : To determine reliability reproducibility shoulder abduction resistance test two tool , elastic tube isokinetic dynamometer . In addition analyze metabolic profile comparative order target subsequent training prescription . Method : The study consist sample 30 participant carry 2 stage , 15 participant perform step 1 15 perform step 2 . The difference step order tool use perform test . Each stage consist 5 session ( Orientation , Familiarization 1 2 , Test Retest ) . During test retest session physiological response test analyze . In order observe response , analyze lactic anaerobic parameter ( lactate concentration ) , allelic anaerobic ( post-exercise oxygen uptake analysis - EPOC ) , aerobic parameter ( VO2 value ) electromyographic measurement . Will use statistical package SPSS Statistics 22.0 , Pearson 's correlation respective confidence interval indicate relationship numerical variable multivariate model construct mean linear regression . The significance level 5 % adopt .
DOC.detailed_description: Tests apply 1RM test The 1 RM test elastic band base study ANDERSEN et al . ( 2016 ) . Elastic band brand Theraband® CLX ( Hygienic , Corporation , Akron , Ohio , USA ) standard length 1.47m , range low high strength ( yellow , red , green , blue , black , silver , gold ) . Due possible change mechanical property elastic band initial stretch cycle , elastic pre-stretched 100 time . Initially research assistant instruct participant sit chair , place foot together elastic band without shoe . Starting least elastic resistance ( yellow ) , research assistant instruct participant perform shoulder abduction unilateral ( dominant ) shoulder 90 ° hold position 3 second ( statically ) . Thus , participant perform concentric contraction phase without help research assistant reach static test position . Through visual inspection , search assistant control correct position movement . Two-minute interval teach resistance level possible participant reach / hold position 3 second . When failure , two attempt reach maintain desired position accomplish . During essay , research assistant provide verbal encouragement . The obtained torque calculate formula base study ANDERSEN et al . ( 2016 ) . Isokinetic muscle strength test For MVIC test , participant seat dominant upper limb Biodex System Pro 4 isokinetic dynamometer ( Biodex Medical System , Shirley-NY , USA ) . Prior test , participant undergo warm-up consist 10 repetition concentric contraction abduction-adduction shoulder 180º / throughout range motion . After warm-up give two-minute rest break start MVIC . The CIVM consider Of torque obtain three 5 second repetition abduction , dominant upper limb position 90º horizontal abduction shoulder . A two-minute interval replicates administer order minimize possible fatigue effect . The participant instruct perform maximum power performance verbally encourage evaluator attempt make . Such protocol base one use BARONI et al. , ( 2010 ) low limb . Fatigue Resistance Test ( TRF ) TRF - Elastic Tube : To perform fatigue resistance test elastic tube participant initially position sit chair foot together step elastic band without shoe . He perform 20-second abduction-adduction heating shoulder neutral position 90 ° . The interval 2 minute give start TRF . This consist perform maximum possible repetition load 50 % 1RM ( 1½ second concentric phase 1½ second eccentric phase ) . TRF - Isokinetic Dynamometer : In order perform fatigue resistance test isokinetic dynamometer , participant initially position dominant upper limb attach dynamometer mean apparatus . He perform warm-up 10 concentric contraction abduction-adduction shoulder 180º / throughout range movement ( 0º 90º ) . The interval 2 minute give start TRF . This consist perform maximum possible repetition 50 % MVIC rate 60º / abduction 500º / return movement .
